QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Feralas!
QuestData.Description: All able bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Konu Runetotem at Camp Ataya in Feralas. Help the Horde secure the great forest against the Alliance and the Grimtotems.$B$BYou can reach Camp Ataya by traveling south from Desolace and into Feralas.$B$BDestiny calls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Konu Runetotem at Camp Ataya in Feralas.
QuestData.RewardText: There is much wrong in Feralas. I am glad to have your help.
